Name: Anime Cards
About the game: Welcome to the game 'Anime cards'! A real puzzle in the style of 'anime'. Animal cards will test your memorization, attentiveness and intelligence skills! It will also help develop them! In front of you are cards with different images in the style of 'Anime'. Images are hidden from you. You need to find all pairs of identical pictures. Two cards can be revealed at the same time. Memorize pictures, look for pairs for them, and try to use as few attempts as possible, because in this game you can set your own records, which makes it possible to play together with friends! The game has 20 levels. After each completed level, a new level will open for you, with a new difficulty. Well, rather turn on the game and join us! Enjoy your game!
